name: WakiZoids Xmas Edition
description:
The Christmas version of WakiZoids with added space pet!

This is the start of the next generation of WakiZoids (https://imekon.itch.io/wakizoids), the game I submitted to Game Off 2017 (https://itch.io/jam/game-off-2017).

This version has a replaced tracking system, allowing short range and long range tracking along with filtering.

I plan to add more features over time - planets, hyperspace, trading etc. Wherever my imagination and coding abilities take me!

Enjoy!

WARNING: this doesn't run in Firefox Quantum and has issues running in Chrome.
